Text:
You keep uploading all of your torrents to the wrong categories.
When you do that, you are forcing the staff to move all of them.

Feature films should be uploaded to Movies
TV episodes should be uploaded to TV shows.

Neither belongs in Video > Other, where you have been uploading them.

I have taken away your green skull for now, until you come to your senses.
You can reach me in the forum:  http://forum.suprbay.org/
